Subject:=092- SURVEY/INFORMATION EMAIL 5-14- 01 Current Notes User:=20 To ensure that you experience a successful migration from Notes to Outlook,= it is necessary to gather individual user information prior to your date o= f migration. Please take a few minutes to completely fill out the followin= g survey. Double Click on document to put it in "Edit" mode. When you finis= h, simply click on the 'Reply With History' button then hit 'Send' Your su= rvey will automatically be sent to the Outlook 2000 Migration Mailbox. Thank you.
